title: Minecraft In Real Life: How Big Are Spiders?! Ft. KYR Speedy
author: 星E君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2014-1-2 20:16 编辑 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjU2NjgxMDQ4/v.swf


本人的话：
别问我要中文翻译，自己学英语去。


原介绍：
Voiced by: http://www.youtube.com/user/speedyw03
Animated by: http://www.youtube.com/user/1029chrisb
Minecraft IRL Playlist: http://bit.ly/IRLPlaylist


Welcome back to another Episode of "In Real Life" a series where we take in game instances, and see how they would apply to the real world!
